channel.title: [Class Suggestion] Janitor (Blue Dragon)
channel.description:
**Janitor** _Blue Dragon Investigative_
Passive: Unique - This is a unique class.
Night Ability 1: What Killed You - What did the player die by. (3)
Converted Into
**Custodian** _Unseen Support_
Night Ability 1: What’s Your Class? - Clean somebody who the Assassin is killing. This will remove the logs and the class of the person. You will secretly know their class and their logs. (3)
Night Ability 2: What Killed My Unseen?- See what did the Unseen member died by (2)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Janitor (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Why is it unique? The main ability is super weak and limited use.

The cleaning is good, but everything else is UP.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Janitor (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Also all of these ideas are in the wrong catagory. It’s supposed to be in classes/lore.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Janitor (Blue Dragon)

Night Ability 2:

What Killed My Unseen?- See what did the Unseen member died by (2)

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Janitor (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
VortexHDPlays:

What’s Your Class? - Clean somebody who the Assassin is killing. This will remove the logs and the class of the person. You will secretly know their class and their logs. (3)

Herbalist already accomplishes this but better.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Janitor (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
VortexHDPlays:

Night Ability 1:

What Killed You - What did the player die by. (3)

So your telling me that your suggestng a class who’s only Ability is to see how someone died and it’s 3 shot!? That’s TERRIBLE.

Read full topic

item.title: [Class Suggestion] Janitor (Blue Dragon)
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
you should have just put all 3 of the classes you suggested into a single thread

Read full topic
